DOC.brief_summary: Olive oil and Omega 3 have many anti inflammatory effects that may be beneficial in the inflammation and edema of chronic stasis dermatitis. The olive oil contains many mono unsaturated fatty acids and anti oxidants that may add to the well being of a diseased skin by improving cell membrane homeostasis.
DOC.brief_title: Olive Oil With Omega 3 to Treat Stasis Dermatitis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with chronic stasis dermatitis due to venous insufficiency will be treated with the study cream and as control we will use "Venoroutone" . Patients will be followed weekly at the clinic of the vascular surgery at Assaf Harofeh MC.
DOC.criteria: Patints with stasis dermatitis for 6 months at least skin ulceration or infection
DOC.keyword: Patients with stasis dermatitis for at least six months.
